entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
